page.title: 01** INTRODUCTION **
page.content:
Our area is important because it contains{4 villages}with a total population of well under 3000.
It has variety - arable land, an aquadrome, old churches, new roads, an aggregate works.
Within that framework there are old customs and traditions that are still observed and at other times examples of where parts of the{HISTORY}of a village have been obliterated.
Campaigns, external and internal change to buildings too!
All have combined to make a significant impact on the lives of villagers on the edge of a{market town in the{East Midlands.
